column3: [ˌeldaˈloːte]}}) was the wife of [[Angrod]]. Her son was [[Orodreth]], a lord of [[Nargothrond]]. She does not seem to have joined her husband and son into [[Exile of the Noldor
column4: exile]], as she is not mentioned in any of the tales of [[Beleriand]].<ref>{{PM
column5: Shibboleth}}, ''The names of Finwë's descendants'', p. 346</ref>
